metadata.Summary: This frame shows the n8n workflow editor for the 'Handling Job Application Submissions' workflow, with a persistent error message for the 'Save to Airtable' node: 'Forbidden - perhaps check your credentials?'. The user is viewing the workflow canvas, specifically focusing on the 'Save to Airtable' node and the 'Language Models' section to its right, while still under 'You have control' from OpenAI's Operator.
metadata.ToolsVisible: n8n, OpenAI's Operator (control message), Web Browser
metadata.ActionsDetected: Viewing n8n workflow editor canvas, Observing persistent error message for 'Save to Airtable' node, Focusing view on 'Save to Airtable' and 'Language Models' nodes, Potentially investigating Airtable credential issue within the workflow, Remaining in 'You have control' mode
metadata.TechnicalDetails: Tool: n8n, Workflow Name: Handling Job Application Submissions, View: Editor (Workflow Canvas), Error Message: 'Problem in node 'Save to Airtable', Error Details: 'Forbidden - perhaps check your credentials?', Nodes visible and clearly labelled: Save to Airtable, Upload File to Record, Redirect to Application Form, Language Models, Save to Applicant Tracking System, Message: 'You have control' (from Operator), Button: 'Finish up' (from Operator), n8n URL visible in browser address bar: `jaywalked.app.n8n.cloud/workflow/V6Y3yWDIl4DQMiLu`
metadata.RelationshipToPrevious: This frame is a direct continuation of frame 90, showing the same 'Forbidden' error for the 'Save to Airtable' node and the user still in 'You have control' mode. The persistent error indicates that the Airtable credential issue has not yet been resolved and is the current focus of debugging.

Handling Job Application Submissions
Save to Applicant Tracking System
